articles.content: When you were young, there was quite likely a stage where you longed to roam the hundred acre woods with Pooh, Piglet, Christopher Robin and the gang as you become enthralled by the world created by … [+2717 chars]

articles.author: Harry Howard
articles.title: Covid Trinidad: Health minister hits back at Nicki Minaj over swollen testicles vaccine claim - Daily Mail
articles.description: Trinidad's health chief Dr Terrence Deyalsingh (pictured) blasted the rapper, saying he and his team had 'wasted so much time running down this false claim'.
articles.content: Trinidad and Tobago's health minister has criticised Nicki Minaj for wasting his time by forcing him to look into the safety of the Covid-19 vaccine after she claimed that the jab left a cousin's fri… [+5349 chars]
